hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

GC (Maze).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #Saria's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #6# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Potion Bottle#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #7# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Green Potion Bottle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Magic Meter#.
